articles.title: Liverpool 'admire' Son Heung-min as Juventus and Barcelona ready to battle Reds for €40m attacker - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Media watch: Liverpool are one of a few clubs who supposedly 'admire' Tottenham forward Son Heung-min, while Mikkel Damsgaard's price has been set amid interest from across Europe.
articles.content: Welcome to our Liverpool.com media watch piece. Maybe not the first, we've definitely done transfer round-ups before, and European round-ups, so I guess in some ways it's not that new at all. Anyway,… [+4035 chars]

articles.title: Benefits of mRNA Covid-19 vaccines outweigh rare heart risks, says WHO - The Straits Times
articles.description: Earlier, Europe's drug regulator said it had found a possible link between heart inflammation and mRNA vaccines.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
